name: THE RACING DEAD
description:
The Racing Dead is a 3D racing game, an independent project in the early prototype phase, and was developed by @RickGood for the B&W Game Jam hosted by Lone Rabbit.

The version you can download has only one level. In reality, only one graveyard, and you can play in single-player mode against Bots or Local Multiplayer mode against 3 players.

The project is in its initial phase, and adjustments will certainly be needed, so if you find something like a bug that needs to be resolved, contact me through the channels below.

The entire project was implemented at Unity 2021 using some third-party assets with all the rights I acquired.

Controls Contacts
